section.heading: Service in Armed Forces — Rank or grade preserved; restriction on compensation.
section.text: No officer or member of the Metropolitan Police force or of the Fire Department of the District of Columbia shall, by reason of the enactment of § 5-1302, be:

para.text: Reduced in rank or grade; or
Entitled to any compensation for any period prior to July 1, 1947.

annotations.annotation: Merit system, application to police officers and firefighters, see § 1-632.03.
